beer.name: Big Tony's
beer.description: A crisp, clean Pilsner with a floral, herbal hop bite supported by a biscuity backbone. We wanted to make a good beer to pair with pizza, because who doesn't love pizza and beer?! This pilsner is named after Tony Palumbo, owner of Papa's Pizzeria!

beer.name: Ol' Rusty
beer.description: A classic American Amber Ale boasting sweet caramel, fruity esters resembling dark fruits, and finishing with a slight earthy bitterness! Named after  George Hairston Jr.  who was given the nickname Ol’ Rusty for starting a small furnace and foundry called Union Iron Works Company! They refined the iron from the Fairystone iron mines so it could be made into products to be sold.

beer.name: Dick & Willie
beer.description: Named after the famous Railroad that ran through Henry County now turned into the famous walking trail. Tasting notes of dark chocolate, coffee, oatmeal, and a hint of maple syrup. This is an easy drinking dark beer.

beer.name: Tricorn
beer.description: Named after the hat worn by revolutionary war soldiers and officers, this IPA has a blend of three hops: Galaxy, Amarillo, and Citra. This was made for our hop heads! Tasting notes should include passionfruit, grapefruit, lime, and clean citrus brought on from this blend of hops. Hints of caramel and malt may be tasted. General Joseph Martin possibly could have been wearing this hat when he claimed “Scuffle Hill” as his land.

beer.name: The Big Chair
beer.description: This is our flagship Blonde Ale, hopped with El Dorado and Huell melon giving it a sweet taste with hints of melon. The name “Big Chair” comes from the worlds largest chair that was manufactured by Bassett Furniture and used to be displayed in Uptown Martinsville.

beer.name: Da 'Rona
beer.description: Our Mexican Cerveza is light hopped, clean and refreshing with a slight aroma of lime peel. It’s served best with a fresh slice of lime while you sit outside and enjoy some fresh air during this quarantine.

beer.name: Maple Mead
beer.description: A Semi - Sweet Acerglyn Mead made from a blend of Tupelo Honey, Manuka Honey, Wildflower Honey, and Maple Syrup. It has delicate buttery, caramelized honey, maple, and oak tasting notes.

beer.name: Motueka Smash
beer.description: A Single Malt and Single Hop IPA featuring Crisp Chevallier Heritage Malt and New Zealand Motueka Hops. This IPA boasts flavors and aromas of lemon, lime, tropical fruit, and orange marmalade.

beer.name: Type I
beer.description: A nice full-bodied porter with tasting notes of roasty black coffee containing hints of chocolate. This porter features a medium roast of coffee from our friends at The Ground Floor in Uptown Martinsville.

beer.name: Fly Line
beer.description: It's about time to cast those Fly Lines into the Smith River! That said, we thought you needed a crushable ipa. This IPA was lagered with NOVA Lager yeast and brewed with chinook, centennial, citra, and el dorado hops to bring you tasting notes of citrus and citrus peel upfront followed by a clean, crisp piney finish!.

beer.name: Bee City
beer.description: Our flagship sparkling session mead made with WG Bee Farm's wildflower honey! It provides delicate tasting notes of sweet honey and floral undertones with an apple cider like finish! Name is in honor of both The City of Martinsville and The Town of Ridgeway being Bee City USA Affiliates.

beer.name: Tupelo Mead
beer.description: A Semi-Sweet Mead made with 100% Tupelo honey that has delicate buttery tasting notes with hints of citrus, floral, and rosewater undertones!

beer.name: Painkiller Slushie Seltzer
beer.description: The perfect drink for warm weather! This slushie boasts all the traditional flavors of the rum based cocktail including pineapple, coconut, mango, and citrus fruits.

beer.name: Kin Town
beer.description: A Japanese Rice Lager that boasts hints of sweet rice upfront but finishes crisp, clean, and dry with herbal, floral, and lemony undertones! All the Marines stationed on Camp Hansen know that Kin Town is the place to get drinks! A Japanese Town on Okinawa full of bars conveniently located right outside a Marine Corps Base!

beer.name: Strawberry Rhubarb Vanilla Mead
beer.description: A Sweet Mead that has delicate tasting notes of sweet honey, strawberry, rhubarb, and vanilla!

beer.name: General Joe's
beer.description: A crisp, resfreshing light lager with light bready, apple, and herbal undertones! Named after General Joesph Martin, the revolutionary war general credited as the founder of Martinsville!

beer.name: Midway
beer.description: A German Brown Lager with tasting notes of toast, chocolate, nuts, caramel and toffee. Before being known as the Town of Collinsville, the area was once called “Midway” because it was said to be midway between Bassett and Martinsville.

beer.name: A Lighter Shade of Pale
beer.description: A single hopped Hazy Pale Ale made with Vic Secret hops. It has a sweet taste with hints of mango, citrus and pineapple accompanied by a slight hoppy bitterness.

beer.name: Fruit Punch Seltzer
beer.description: Crisp, bubbly and refreshing hard seltzer water made with Orange, Peach, Passionfruit, and Strawberry! Made to resemble your favorite fruit punch beverages!

beer.name: Oktoberfest
beer.description: Our take on a traditional German Oktoberfest. Made with all german malts and hops boasting tasting notes resembling sourdough bread, caramel, and some light fruity esters.

beer.name: Orchard Drive
beer.description: Our Flagship cider made with a blend of Macintosh and Granny Smith Apples. Crisp and refreshing, it highlights both the tartness and the sweetness of the apples.

beer.name: Strawberry Wine
beer.description: This light refreshing wine offers the delightfully sweet aroma of fresh picked strawberries blended with a rich melange of honey, tropical fruit and floral flavors.

beer.name: Naked Gose
beer.description: A tart German sour ale made with sea salt and coriander! This is the traditional way a Gose would be made in Germany with no fruit additions. The additions of coriander and sea salt combine to give it a nice lemony sour. This is made for people who love a sour beer!

beer.name: Summer Song
beer.description: A tart, crisp, bubbly hard lemonade! Perfect thirst quencher for those hot summer days!

beer.name: Pröst
beer.description: Meaning Cheers in German, Pröst is our German Hefeweizen with an American twist! Bringing mellow flavors of banana and clove traditional to a Hefeweizen, with a slight citrusy orange flavor coming from the small dry hop of Cascade and Amarillo we added!

beer.name: Farmhouse Cider
beer.description: Made with a Blend of Apples from South Cider (A Cidery coming soon to MHC). These Apples include Ruby Red Crab, Ashmeads Kernel, Harrison, Winesap, and  Limbertwig!  This Cider presents farmhouse notes from the Saison yeast used in it plus finishes nice, tart, dry, and clean!

beer.name: Sweet Lou
beer.description: A tradional Belgian Witbier made with coriander and sweet orange peel. It brings tasting notes of sweet malty wheat, coriander, citrus zest, and orange peel. It pairs great with a slice of orange! Name after Sweet Lou Whitaker, who graduated from Martinsville High, who later went on to play baseball for the Detriot Tigers. He was considered for the MLB Hall of Fame and his jersey No. 1 was retired by the Tigers in 2022.

beer.name: Major Redd
beer.description: Boasting malty and fruity flavors upfront, finishing with a nice grapefruit and resinous bite! The Columbus, Chinook, Galaxy, and Mosaic hops work in tandem with the malts to bring a unique flavor to this brew! Named after Major John Redd, one of the first settlers to come to Henry County, served as a Major in the American Continental Forces during the revolution, and later went on to serve as High Sheriff, as well as a member on the County Court for 40 years! He also built his Belleview Estate listed on the National Register of Historic Places!

beer.name: Uluru Aussie Amber
beer.description: An experimental Amber Ale made with all Australian Hops (Galaxy and Vic Secret). It brings forward tasting notes and aromas of pineapple, stone fruit, and tropical fruits while finishing up with a toasty, caramel backbone. The name is derived from the infamous Uluru Red Rock in Australia.

beer.name: PT Schwartz
beer.description: A German Black Lager that's clean, light and crisp even for its dark complexion. This lager boasts smooth tasting notes of caramel, chocolate, and lightly roasted coffee! You need to put on your PT Shorts we mean...Schwartz before PT at 0 Dark 30!

beer.name: Orange Blossom Mead
beer.description: A mead made from Orange Blossom honey that has tasting notes of sweet honey and citrus upfront with floral undertones and a warming complex alcohol in the finish!

beer.name: Mustangs Mango Wheat
beer.description: A Wheat Ale made with Mango Puree. Named in honor of our local baseball team the Martinsville Mustangs! It provides tasting notes of sweet mango with hints of banana provided from the fruity esters from the yeast.

beer.name: McNally's Porter
beer.description: A medium bodied Robust Porter with tasting notes of creamy chocolate, caramel, and a hint of roastiness! We named this Porter after our friend Sean McNally because on every visit to the brewery he always said we needed a basic Porter with NO ADJUNCTS! This one's for you Sean, Cheers!

beer.name: Hickey's Fort
beer.description: This style of lagered porter presents rich, complex tasting notes of dark chocolate, coffee, and dark fruits like raisins or plums while finishing with a clean lager character. Hickey's Fort, also known as Hickey's Ordinary, was one of the last stops for immigrants traveling The Great Wagon Road. It was situated along the Smith River and provided a place for camping and to restock on supplies. It was also used as a defensive fort against Indian attacks during the French and Indian War.

beer.name: Stubbie
beer.description: Hey, pass me a Stubbie! This is what you may hear kiwis call a beer in New Zealand! This Pilsner was brewed and dry hopped with all New Zealand hops. It’s clean, crisp and refreshing! The flavors of Motueka, Pacific Jade, and Nelson Sauvin bring tasting notes of lemon, lime, and citrus.

beer.name: Omicron
beer.description: Our Dark Mexican Cerveza boasting flavors and aromas of toasted bread, caramel, with a slightly floral bitterness! The taste is just as infectious as the name, pairs great with a lime!

beer.name: The Great Wagon Road
beer.description: A crisp, dry biscuity and bready German Pilsner with an earthy bitter bite! Named after the old immigration route taken by German settlers when they came to America! A leg of this route once ran through what is now Martinsville city!

beer.name: Scuffling Up Hops W/ HBC 630, HBC 1019, & Krush
beer.description: This version of our rotating NEIPA series features HBC 630, HBC 1019, and Krush Hops! This blend provides tasting notes of tangerine, pineapple, tropical fruits, and finishes with a slight earthy bitterness!
